alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 6:54PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Platte and southeastern Converse Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 654 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Douglas, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Glendo around 725 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 110 and 136. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for southeastern and east central Wyoming.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; North Laramie Range
